author: HanyouOnikage

text: This game was unappreciated. Like BG&E. It was simply incredible and really challenging during the end, with an incredibly tough final boss called Beemer. What separated from other racers were the originality of the weapons, the hilarious cast and the stages and gameplay that defined the cart sims more than any other game up until CTR. And did I say cart? What cart? All you had was the wheels, the steering wheel and the exhaust pipes. Cause that is all you really need.
